title: How do we make Double Ka Meetha? - Quora

response.answer_text: Step by Step process for Double ka meetha preparation: Double ka meeta is a very popular sweet dish in India made with milk, Bread and dry fruits. It prefers to prepare mainly in weddings, parties. It is a bread pudding Hyderabad dessert recipe mainly prepared on the occasion of Ramadan and Eid. Ingredients to prepare Double ka meeta:  Double ka meetha Ingredients: Bread – 6 slicesMilk – 2 cupsSugar – as per your tasteCardamom powder or elaichi powder – 1 spoonChopped cashew nuts – 2 spoonsChopped badam – 2 spoonsRaisins – fewGhee or oilKesar or saffron – 3 or 4Tips when preparing Double ka meetha: We can prepare double ka meetha without removing the edges of bread slices but it does not make much difference after frying them.We can use sugar syrup instead of mixing sugar directly.Read more
